title: Supreme Lord - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Alchemy   Apathetic Protagonist   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Arrogant Characters   Artifact Crafting   Artifacts   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Cultivation   Dao Comprehension   Determined Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heavenly Tribulation   Hiding True Identity   Lazy Protagonist   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Multiple Realms   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Playful Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Sharp-tongued Characters   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Jiu Heng   九哼
description:
At the end of the Near Ancient Era, the Tribulation of Heavens descended and the Heavenly Dao began to judge all evil in the world.
Because he was regarded as the embodiment of evil, Gu Qingfeng, the legendary tyrant whose power shook all 3,000 worlds had met his demise under the Heavenly Dao’s wrath.

A hundred years later, after his name had long ago become a legend within the legends, he awakened at his cemetery!>
